name: Little Red Riding Hood Theatre
description:
Little Red Riding Hood - Puppet Theatre for Kids
Your child can host their own puppet show.

Great app for kids who love to play with puppets and put on shows, on this app there is 5 Characters from little red riding hood and 5 backdrops from the classic show.

How to use
Simply pick 1 (Or More) of the characters and move them around the screen just like you would on a real puppet theatre,
Swipe left/right to change the backdrop of your play
Can move all 5 characters at once so great to play with friends
Double tap on a character to remove them

Will keep kids entertained for hours

For more great apps check out our website or follow us on twitter or facebook.
